{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = TL-WR840N UN 6.20 02.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 300Mbps Wireless Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/TL-WR840N.html |sp = http://www.tp-link.com/en/download/TL-WR840N.html |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = TP-LINK_TL-WR840N_v6 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = TL-WR840N |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v6 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 09/20/2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_TL-WR840N_v6 |wlclass = N300 |series = TL-WR840 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7EN020F5 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2050501000 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7628N;MT7628NN, 1804-AJCSL, EAP1B904; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 575 / 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q32CSIG; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Zentel;A3S56D40GTP;A3S56D40GTP -50L, 805ZENT9; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;4.3.0.0;Ralink; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.6 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-LINK_XXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = ES/EU |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/11/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2050501000" and "1809" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|TP-LINK TL-WR850N v1|TP-LINK}}
==Links of Interest== [https://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/Emulator_TL-WR840NV6_EU/index.htm Demo UI]
